text:
Whenever the Board of Supervisors shall, by motion, disapprove the decision of the Planning Commission on appeal and authorize a conditional use, pursuant to Charter Section 
4.105 and the Planning Code, the Clerk of the Board of Supervisors shall immediately notify the Assessor of such action in writing. 
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; amended by Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)

heading.catch_text: CONDITIONAL USE; APPEAL TO BOARD OF SUPERVISORS.
